resource_section: Distribution of Occupancy Rates by District (Percentage)- 2020
remarks: Dataset contains hotel occupancy rate statistics by district for 2020, showing the occupancy rate percentage for each of the 25 districts of Sri Lanka. Columns: District and Occupancy Rate. Data ranges from Galle (23.2%) and Kandy (22.0%) having the highest rates, to Kilinochchi, Mullaitivu, and Mannar (0%) having no occupancy, reflecting the impact of COVID-19 on tourism.
